title: Prosecution Lawyer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Suspension of the Writ of Habeas Corpus (Night): Choose a player. Their trial will no longer be seen by a neutral judge. You may determine how many votes it takes to lynch this player. This number cannot be less than half of the majority vote nor can it exceed 150% of the majority vote. Nobody else will be notified about this. Their Writ of Habeas Corpus will be reinstituted the following day, and you may no longer suspend their Writ of Habeas Corpus.
- Bill of Attainder (Day): Choose a player. They will be convicted without a trial. If they receive another vote within the next thirty minutes, they will instantly be lynched. You lose this ability the first time it results in a lynch.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Unseen goal. Also get the Mastermind some Raising Cane's chicken fingers.

desc:
Post 1930
*I have upgraded my audio equipment.*
